TopicTitle: Pride-3A - Rocket and lander for the Muna

Articles.Content:
Last time, when I was on the Muna, I used replicas of real rockets to get there, but some days ago I've made my own rocket.

So I introduce you "Pride-3A"!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I was inspired by USA missions to the Moon and by USSR project of mission to the Moon, while building this rocket, so you can see similarities.

Rocket has three stages. It carry lander and command pod. Lander has two stages and some scientific equipment: two antennas, one solar-powered generator and unkerballed rover.

Some characteristics of the craft:

Part count - 554

Mass - 762t

Liquid fuel - 53462

Oxidizer - 65342

Monopropellant - 710

Electric charge - 3491

Action groups:

1 - toggle antennas

2 - toggle scientific equipment

Download - click

Hope you'll like it!

Edited September 15, 2014 by Nik_601
I like lander's scientific cargo) And the whole project is cool!
